channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-5803] [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk
item.description: TBoundedThreadPoolServer has been a problem for us when there is a large number of clients. We need to migrate to 0.8.0. in 89-fb and bring the relevant improvements from trunk, including supporting TThreadedSelectorServer.
item.summary: [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
mbautin requested code review of "[jira] HBASE-5803 [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk".
Reviewers: sc, nspiegelberg, Kannan, Liyin, JIRA

TBoundedThreadPoolServer has been a problem for us when there is a large number of clients. We need to migrate to 0.8.0. in 89-fb and bring the relevant improvements from trunk, including supporting TThreadedSelectorServer.

TEST PLAN

  • Run unit tests
  • Deploy to a test cluster, turn on the load, and monitor correctness/performance

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D2811

AFFECTED FILES
pom.xml
src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HConstants.java
src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/ParseFilter.java
src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/HRegionThriftServer.java

Tip: use the X-Herald-Rules header to filter Herald messages in your client.

sc has commented on the revision "[jira] HBASE-5803 [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk".

INLINE COMMENTS
src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/thrift/ThriftServerRunner.java:888 There are some places that we use
ByteBuffer.array() instead of reading from the correct offsets.
They cause problem when using framed transport protocols.

See
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-5736

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D2811

mbautin updated the revision "[jira] HBASE-5803 [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk".
Reviewers: sc, nspiegelberg, Kannan, Liyin, JIRA

  • Addressing Scott's comment.
  • Breaking TestThriftServerCmdLine into multiple parts because its running time became too long (will be ported to trunk).
  • Not waiting before a retry in a multiput if all errors were NotServingRegionExceptions (this will also be a separate JIRA but is included here for testing).

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D2811

sc has accepted the revision "[jira] HBASE-5803 [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk".

Looks good to me. Good work!

https://reviews.facebook.net/D2811

BRANCH
upgrade_hbase_0_89_fb_to_thrift_0_8_0_and_HBASE-5803_v9

mbautin updated the revision "[jira] HBASE-5803 [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk".
Reviewers: sc, nspiegelberg, Kannan, Liyin, JIRA

Keeping the old TestThriftServer around as TestThriftServerLegacy (reusing some of the methods) since there seem to be slight differences and we want to get the maximum test coverage out of existing tests.

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D2811

mbautin updated the revision "[jira] HBASE-5803 [89-fb] Upgrade hbase 0.89-fb to Thrift 0.8.0 and bring Thrift server enhancements from trunk".
Reviewers: sc, nspiegelberg, Kannan, Liyin, JIRA

Using separate configuration key "namespaces" for Thrift proxy and embedded Thrift server: "hbase.thrift." and "hbase.regionserver.thrift." Also using different ports by default (9090 for proxy and 9091 for embedded Thrift server).

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D2811
